headline: The Billion-Dollar Battle Over an Internet Domain: .Org
abstract: A private equity firm wants to buy the internet domain used by nonprofits. A group of online pioneers says it is not the place to maximize profits.
lead_paragraph: Two months ago, Ethos Capital, a private equity firm, announced that it planned to buy the rights to a tract of internet real estate for more than $1 billion.
keywords: Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers
